section.title: Summary of Changes in GridWay
section.para: GridWay version shipped with GT4.2.1 is based on GridWay 5.4, a new stable version with increased functionality, including support to access the NorduGrid infrastructure, new bindings for DRMAA and support for DAGMAN workflows.
New to 4.2.1: Since this is an incremental release, only bug fixes have been included.
